type.title: Output type
type.description: The type of knowledge object, generated by the function (i.e., 'lookup')

destination.title: Configuration for store destination
destination.description: Configures where and how the data should be stored

fieldMapping.title: Mapping of field names
fieldMapping.description: Mapping event property names to output field names

separator.title: Separator for CSV output
separator.description: Character to be used as value delimiter in output

overwrite.title: Overwrite destination
overwrite.description: For existing files, an error is thrown if overwrite is false or the file is replaced if overwrite is true

compress.title: Compress the output
compress.description: True will compress output, false leaves it as it is and auto decides based on size

tee.title: Tee Results
tee.description: Tee results to the next operator

maxEvents.title: Maximum number of events
maxEvents.description: Limits how many events can be stored

suppressPreviews.title: Suppress previews
suppressPreviews.description: Suppresses the timer-based export stats generating
